title: I Can't Get Over Nordstrom's Sale Department—Yes to These Sweaters and Shoes
text: When you hear Nordstrom is having a sale it is always worth checking out. Whether it is your favorite brands or key styles that you have been eye-ing, the Nordstrom buy has the variety that keeps on giving.Two of my personal favorite categories are knits and footwear, which never go out of style. And, some of the options on Nordstrom's Half-Yearly Sale are can't-miss buys that don't compromise the budget. Brands like UGG, Staud, New Balance, and Good American included. Treasure & Bond Turtleneck Sweater A classic knit that you'll keep for years to come. Open Edit Sophia Pointed Toe Slingback Pump SARTO by Franco Sarto Jasmine Block Heel Boot These western-influenced boots have a sleek silhouette. Open Edit Tricia Square Toe Slide Sandal STAUD Bishop Sleeve Wool Mock Neck Sweater Staud on sale is a rare find. UGG Classic Mini Platform Boot These boots are historically sold out. Caslon Rib Turtleneck Sweater A sweater that's as effortless as it is cozy. Open Edit Remington Ankle Strap Sandal Wear these for so many occasions. Theory Short Sleeve Cashmere Sweater Discounted Theory pieces are quite the deal. Jeffrey Campbell Holed Mary Jane Flat Obsessing over these hardware-adorned flats. Marc Fisher LTD Dariya Knee High Riding Boot Vince Camuto Funnel Neck Sweater The funnel neck trend in knitwear form. Dolce Vita Nedi Pointed Toe Knee High Boot Topshop Animal Spot Relaxed Sweater You'll wear this sweater so much more than you think. Steve Madden Glimmer Imitation Pearl Mule These chic slides are a fun work shoe under trousers. Topshop Cable Stitch Cardigan Not your grandpa's cardigan. Good American Cozy Crewneck Sweater This spicy red sweater is the perfect color pop. Steve Madden Dagne Knee High Boot Under-$100 boots that you'll wear for seasons ahead. New Balance 550 Basketball Sneaker These New Balance sneakers have a retro feel. Olive green is a great substitute for a neutral. BP. Quarter Zip Cotton Blend Rib Sweater Loving this expensive-looking quarter zip. Jeffrey Campbell Lash Patent Pointed Toe Pump Topshop Oversize Turtleneck Sweater Love an oversized, cozy knit. Free People Phoebe High-Low Tunic Sweater This is a personal favorite sweater. Topshop Exposed Seam Sweater Caslon Half Button Pima Cotton Blend Sweater The ideal work-from-home top. Nine West Feather Slingback Pump Steve Madden Lyndon Lug Sole Mary Jane These chunky Mary Janes are giving Bottega Veneta. Topshop Rib Sleeve Sweater ALDO X Wicked Perfectly Pink Slingback Pointed Toe Pump Topshop Fluffy Relaxed Fit Sweater Butter yellow has been all over the runways. Copelyn is a freelance fashion and accessory editor. She formerly worked for Who What Wear as an associate shopping editor and is based in New York City. She writes about fashion and accessory trends in addition to creating original content. Before her time at Who What Wear, Copelyn was at Bustle Digital Group, working on the accessory market for cover shoots and fashion features across Nylon, The Zoe Report, Bustle, Romper, and Elite Daily. Copelyn also previously worked at InStyle and Cosmopolitan in the fashion and accessory departments on shopping and fashion market. Copelyn has a journalism degree from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. In her spare time, Copelyn freelances in graphic and web design in the fashion-and-lifestyle space. She also loves to upcycle clothing and home décor as well as collect an embarrassing number of colorful sneakers and experiment with her hair color.
html:
When you hear Nordstrom is having a sale it is always worth checking out. Whether it is your favorite brands or key styles that you have been eye-ing, the Nordstrom buy has the variety that keeps on giving.

Two of my personal favorite categories are knits and footwear, which never go out of style. And, some of the options on Nordstrom's Half-Yearly Sale are can't-miss buys that don't compromise the budget. Brands like UGG, Staud, New Balance, and Good American included.

Treasure & Bond

Turtleneck Sweater

A classic knit that you'll keep for years to come.

Open Edit

Sophia Pointed Toe Slingback Pump

SARTO by Franco Sarto

Jasmine Block Heel Boot

These western-influenced boots have a sleek silhouette.

Open Edit

Tricia Square Toe Slide Sandal

STAUD

Bishop Sleeve Wool Mock Neck Sweater

Staud on sale is a rare find.

UGG

Classic Mini Platform Boot

These boots are historically sold out.

Caslon

Rib Turtleneck Sweater

A sweater that's as effortless as it is cozy.

Open Edit

Remington Ankle Strap Sandal

Wear these for so many occasions.

Theory

Short Sleeve Cashmere Sweater

Discounted Theory pieces are quite the deal.

Jeffrey Campbell

Holed Mary Jane Flat

Obsessing over these hardware-adorned flats.

Marc Fisher LTD

Dariya Knee High Riding Boot

Vince Camuto

Funnel Neck Sweater

The funnel neck trend in knitwear form.

Dolce Vita

Nedi Pointed Toe Knee High Boot

Topshop

Animal Spot Relaxed Sweater

You'll wear this sweater so much more than you think.

Steve Madden

Glimmer Imitation Pearl Mule

These chic slides are a fun work shoe under trousers.

Topshop

Cable Stitch Cardigan

Not your grandpa's cardigan.

Good American

Cozy Crewneck Sweater

This spicy red sweater is the perfect color pop.

Steve Madden

Dagne Knee High Boot

Under-$100 boots that you'll wear for seasons ahead.

New Balance

550 Basketball Sneaker

These New Balance sneakers have a retro feel.

Olive green is a great substitute for a neutral.

BP.

Quarter Zip Cotton Blend Rib Sweater

Loving this expensive-looking quarter zip.

Jeffrey Campbell

Lash Patent Pointed Toe Pump

Topshop

Oversize Turtleneck Sweater

Love an oversized, cozy knit.

Free People

Phoebe High-Low Tunic Sweater

This is a personal favorite sweater.

Topshop

Exposed Seam Sweater

Caslon

Half Button Pima Cotton Blend Sweater

The ideal work-from-home top.

Nine West

Feather Slingback Pump

Steve Madden

Lyndon Lug Sole Mary Jane

These chunky Mary Janes are giving Bottega Veneta.

Topshop

Rib Sleeve Sweater

ALDO

X Wicked Perfectly Pink Slingback Pointed Toe Pump

Topshop

Fluffy Relaxed Fit Sweater

Butter yellow has been all over the runways.

Copelyn is a freelance fashion and accessory editor. She formerly worked for Who What Wear as an associate shopping editor and is based in New York City. She writes about fashion and accessory trends in addition to creating original content. Before her time at Who What Wear, Copelyn was at Bustle Digital Group, working on the accessory market for cover shoots and fashion features across Nylon, The Zoe Report, Bustle, Romper, and Elite Daily. Copelyn also previously worked at InStyle and Cosmopolitan in the fashion and accessory departments on shopping and fashion market. Copelyn has a journalism degree from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. In her spare time, Copelyn freelances in graphic and web design in the fashion-and-lifestyle space. She also loves to upcycle clothing and home décor as well as collect an embarrassing number of colorful sneakers and experiment with her hair color.
